list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of furniture for sleep or rest, typically a framework with a mattress and coverings.
the bottom of the sea or a lake or river.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the gravelly bed of the stream

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an area of ground, typically in a garden, where flowers and plants are grown.
a stratum or layer of rock.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một chiếc giường của đất sét

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a layer of food on which other foods are served.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the salad is served on a bed of raw spinach
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Salad được phục vụ trên một chiếc giường rau bina sống

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a flat base or foundation on which something rests or is supported.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: place each paver on a bed of concrete
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đặt mỗi paver trên một giường bê tông

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: settle down to sleep or rest for the night in an improvised place.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he usually bedded down on newspapers in the church porch
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh thường nằm xuống báo trên hiên nhà thờ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: transfer (a plant) from a pot or seed tray to a garden plot.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi ngủ ngoài những người này

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the posts should be firmly bedded in concrete
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các bài viết nên được đặt chắc chắn trong bê tông
